title: Mendocino Sunrise
marks: \"Mendocino, Sunrise  AP\", in pencil, LL margin \"Toshi Yoshida 1982\", in pencil, LR margin
description: yellow sun in center, behind trees, radiating out with orange rays; 5 deer in foreground; mounted on pale green mat; gold foil border around print; wood frame
creditline: Gift of the Toshi Yoshida family
